name: Sorted! - A MiniJam 62 Game
description:
A Game made for MiniJam 62: Colours

Limitation: All animations must be 2 frames

Sorted!

Is a fast-paced sort-em-up puzzley/action game designed to put your skills to the test. How does it do that, I hear you wonder? By making you sort parcels of course!

Sort small coloured boxes into bigger coloured boxes, and empty the big coloured boxes into the square that empties them. Hold boxes while you wait! Bin the boxes you despise! Do it your way!

Credits:

Leon- Coding, Music, SFX

John- Artwork, Music, Coding

Kenney- Font
